Consultation FAQs

Is the consultation free?

Initial consultation is completely free. We'll learn about your situation in detail and provide preliminary assessment and recommendations. If you decide to engage our services, we'll provide a detailed service agreement and fee breakdown.

How soon will I receive a response?

We typically respond to inquiries within 24 hours on business days. Contacting via WeChat provides faster responses. Inquiries submitted on weekends and holidays will be processed on the next business day.

What documents do I need for consultation?

Initial consultation requires no documents. You simply need to tell us your basic situation and needs. If we proceed to formal assessment, we'll provide a detailed document checklist to guide your preparation.

Will my information be kept confidential?

We strictly adhere to privacy protection policies. All personal information you provide is used solely for consultation services and will not be disclosed to third parties. We employ encryption technology to protect your data security.
